scripts.prep: copyfiles analytics.js dist && concat node_modules/material-design-lite/material.min.js node_modules/seedrandom/seedrandom.min.js > dist/lib.js
scripts.prep-v5: copyfiles analytics.js dist-v5 && concat node_modules/material-design-lite/material.min.js node_modules/seedrandom/seedrandom.min.js > dist-v5/lib.js
scripts.build: npm run prep && npm run build-js && npm run build-css && npm run build-html
scripts.build2: npm run clean && npm run prep && npm run build-wp
scripts.build-v5: npm run clean-v5 && npm run prep-v5 && npm run build-wp-v5
scripts.build-wp: cross-env NODE_ENV=development INDEX_TS=playground.ts DIST_FOLDER=dist BUNDLE_NAME=bundle webpack
scripts.build-wp-v5: cross-env NODE_ENV=development INDEX_TS=playgroundV5.ts DIST_FOLDER=dist-v5 BUNDLE_NAME=bundle TEMPLATE=index-template.html webpack
scripts.watch: npm run prep && concurrently "npm run watch-js" "npm run watch-css" "npm run watch-html"
scripts.build-dnn: npm run clean-tf && mkdirp ./dist-dnn && npm run prep-tf && cross-env NODE_ENV=development INDEX_TS=dnnCreator/index.ts DIST_FOLDER=dist-dnn BUNDLE_NAME=dnnCreator webpack
scripts.build-dnn:watch: npm run clean && mkdirp ./dist && npm run prep && cross-env NODE_ENV=development INDEX_TS=dnnCreator/index.ts DIST_FOLDER=dist-dnn BUNDLE_NAME=dnnCreator webpack --watch
scripts.start-dnn: cross-env NODE_ENV=development INDEX_TS=dnnCreator/index.ts DIST_FOLDER=dist-dnn BUNDLE_NAME=dnnCreator webpack-dev-server --open
